sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import '../PrincipalLecture.css' const PrincipalLecturerDashboard = () => { const [academicStats, setAcademicStats] = useState({ totalFaculty: 0, activeCourses: 0, pendingReviews: 0, averageRating: 0, completionRate: 0, studentSatisfaction: 0 }); const [recentActivities, setRecentActivities] = useState([]); const [performanceMetrics, setPerformanceMetrics] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { // Simulate data fetching loadDashboardData(); }, []); const loadDashboardData = async () => { // Simulated API call const stats = { totalFaculty: 24, activeCourses: 56, pendingReviews: 12, averageRating: 4.3, completionRate: 87, studentSatisfaction: 92 }; const activities = [ { id: 1, type: 'review', message: 'New course submission from Dr. Smith', time: '2 hours ago', priority: 'high' }, { id: 2, type: 'rating', message: 'Performance review completed for Prof. Johnson', time: '5 hours ago', priority: 'medium' }, { id: 3, type: 'approval', message: 'Curriculum changes approved for CS101', time: '1 day ago', priority: 'low' } ]; const metrics = { facultyPerformance: 85, courseQuality: 88, studentEngagement: 79, researchOutput: 91 }; setAcademicStats(stats); setRecentActivities(activities); setPerformanceMetrics(metrics); }; const handleQuickAction = (action) => { switch(action) { case 'review_faculty': console.log('Navigate to faculty review'); break; case 'generate_report': console.log('Generate comprehensive report'); break; case 'quality_audit': console.log('Start quality audit'); break; default: break; } }; return (
{/* Welcome Header */}

Academic Leadership Dashboard

Welcome back, Principal Lecturer. Here's your academic overview.

{/* Key Metrics Cards */}
{academicStats.totalFaculty}

Faculty Members

{academicStats.activeCourses}

Active Courses

{academicStats.pendingReviews}

Pending Reviews

{academicStats.averageRating}/5.0

Avg. Rating

{academicStats.completionRate}%

Completion Rate

{academicStats.studentSatisfaction}%

Student Satisfaction

{/* Main Content Area */}
{/* Performance Metrics */}
Academic Performance Overview
{Object.entries(performanceMetrics).map(([metric, value]) => (
{metric.replace(/([A-Z])/g, ' $1').trim()}
{value}%
))}
{/* Recent Activities */}
Recent Activities
{recentActivities.map(activity => (

{activity.message}

{activity.time}
))}
{/* Quick Actions */}
Quick Actions
handleQuickAction('review_faculty')}>
Faculty Review

Review faculty performance and provide feedback

handleQuickAction('generate_report')}>
Generate Report

Create comprehensive academic reports

handleQuickAction('quality_audit')}>
Quality Audit

Conduct academic quality assessment

Analytics

View detailed academic analytics

); }; export default PrincipalLecturerDashboard;
